DOC.brief_summary: This single arm study assess safety efficacy tocilizumab patient moderate severe active rheumatoid arthritis inadequate response current non-biologic DMARDs . Patients receive iv infusion tocilizumab 8mg/kg every 4 week total 6 infusion , either monotherapy combination current non-biologic DMARDs .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Tocilizumab Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis Who Have Inadequate Response Current Non-Biologic DMARDs
DOC.criteria: adult patient , > =18 year age ; moderate severe rheumatoid arthritis ; inadequate response current nonbiologic DMARDs rheumatic autoimmune disease inflammatory joint disease rheumatoid arthritis ; previous treatment biologics .
